Articles.Content: When I launch the game it will launch across two monitors. On one monitor I will have the loading screen and on the main screen I will get the home screen of the game. There is no way that I have found to resolve this issue, I just have to quit the game and try again. I have 3 monitors incase you wanted to test it. This doesnt happen every single time it happens probably 90% of the time right now.  This was happening since launch and after the update.
